item.title: Trump promised Ukraine 'security guarantees': Here's what they could look like
item.description: Monday's talks saw Trump say security guarantees for Ukraine would be "provided" by European countries with "coordination with the U.S."

item.title: Trump-Zelenskyy meeting paves the way for Ukraine security guarantees, trilateral talks with Putin
item.description: Trump and Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with European leaders and NATO allies in an unprecedented effort to reach a peace deal in Russia's invasio...

item.title: Hamas accepts proposed deal for ceasefire with Israel and hostage release: Reuters
item.description: Hamas has agreed to a ceasefire proposal with Israel that includes the return of half the hostages held in Gaza and Israel's release of some Palestini...

item.title: Traders hope the Ukraine war ends soon. Experts say there's no 'quick fix'
item.description: Global markets were on tenterhooks Monday as momentum to end the war in Ukraine ramped up. Experts warn there is no "quick fix," and talks could last ...

item.title: Trump puts onus on Zelenskyy to end conflict with Russia ahead of meeting
item.description: In a post on Truth Social, Trump said that Zelenskyy could "end the war with Russia almost immediately, if he wants to, or he can continue to fight."
